paragraphs: Results-driven Data Analyst with a strong foundation in data analytics, reporting, and business operations, combining analytical acumen with over 8 years of corporate experience in service delivery and process optimization.

Skilled in leveraging SQL, Excel, and Python to extract insights, automate workflows, and support data-driven decision-making. Adept at collaborating across teams to design dashboards, validate data accuracy, and translate complex information into clear business solutions.
